title: ZK-proofs ‘Particularly Relevant in Financial Services’: Google Cloud Web3 Lead
description: Google Cloud’s Web3 engineering lead highlighted use cases for on-chain privacy preserving technologies like ZK-proofs at CCDAS.

title: Cypherpunk Jameson Lopp sees need for machine learning to improve Bitcoin hashrate estimates
description:
Bitcoin’s global network hashrate may seem like an objective metric, but researcher and Cypherpunk Jameson Lopp reveals measuring it precisely is deceptively tricky. In a recent Proof of Work (POW) Summit talk in Prague, Lopp described his “hunt for the real Bitcoin hashrate” by evaluating the accuracy of various estimation algorithms. As Lopp explained, most […]

The post Cypherpunk Jameson Lopp sees need for machine learning to improve Bitcoin hashrate estimates appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Trust Wallet Token surges 12% despite active users falling
description: Trust Wallet Token rallying, adds 12%. However, there is a divergence with daily active addresses suggesting falling momentum

title: JPEX to become DAO, to freeze assets for 2 years
description: JPEX exchange to become a DAO, turning user assets into dividends with a two-year lockup

title: SBF trial day 2: FTX founder lied says prosecutors, defense blames Ellison and Bitcoin crash
description: Federal prosecutors and defense attorneys shared opening statements on day 2 of SBF's criminal trial in lower Manhattan, New York

title: Hong Kong Stock Exchange launches smart contract-powered settlement platform
description: The Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing Limited (HKEX) is launching Synapse, an acceleration platform that will rely on DAML smart contracts

title: Toncoin’s (TON) Innovative Adoption Wave Gets a Massive Boost with New Investment from Billion-Dollar Giant
description: MEXC Ventures has invested significantly in The Open Network (TON), marking its most ambitious layer-1 financial commitment. The partnership aims to transform Telegram’s app into a user-friendly cryptocurrency hub, with TON as a bridge to the Web3 platform. Recent developments in the cryptocurrency arena have highlighted a game-changing move by MEXC Ventures. The prominent subsidiary [...]

title: Trader Says XRP To ‘Fly’ Once It Breaks Above Critical Resistance Area, Updates Outlook on Bitcoin and Ethereum
description:
A widely followed crypto analyst is expressing bullish sentiment on XRP after a US court rejected the U.S. Securities Exchange Commission’s (SEC) attempt to appeal a decision that partly went in Ripple’s favor in July. Pseudonymous trader Credible Crypto tells his 346,700 followers on the social media platform X that the rejection of the SEC’s […]

The post Trader Says XRP To ‘Fly’ Once It Breaks Above Critical Resistance Area, Updates Outlook on Bitcoin and Ethereum appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
